roleset.name: make duck noises
roleset.note: QUACK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'quack' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 38, Framenet entry Perception noise. (from quack.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: this sentence had to occur eventually
example.text: (Another much-beloved saying, however, this one in plain English, holds that if something walks like a duck and quacks like a duck, it is a duck.
